Address.value: NO. 1 COURTYARD, LIZE ZHONGYI ROAD,BOYA INTERNATIONAL CENTER, BUILDING 2, BEIJING, 100102, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Infobird Co Ltd is engaged in developing and providing customer engagement cloud-based services. It software-as-a-service, provider of innovative AI-powered, or artificial intelligence enabled, customer engagement solutions in China. It primarily provides holistic software solutions to help corporate clients proactively deliver and manage end-to-end customer engagement activities at all stages of the sales process including pre-sales and sales activities and post-sales customer support. It also offer AI-powered cloud-based sales force management software including intelligent quality inspection and intelligent training software to help clients monitor, benchmark and improve the performances of agents.
